name: WallNinja
description:
*This project was created just to learn Google Play Services integration into games. We have learned and added the following features to the game.

Features:

  • Google AdMob
  • Localization(Multiple Languages)
  • Google Game Services
  • Google Leaderboard
  • Google Achievements
  • Google Login
  • Rate Game Panel
  • Game Notifications
  • All platforms Save
